leads.lead_text: Lemma glabrous except for basal hair-tuft and occasionally a few sparse hairs near the awn-base
Lemma more or less covered by silky hairs in the lower half
Rachilla not jointed between florets which fall united at maturity
Rachilla jointed between florets which readily separate at maturity
Lemma shallowly bifid, not bristle-tipped at apex; awn mostly 15–20 mm long, occasionally absent
Lemma apex produced into one or two fine bristles 3–9 mm long; awn 20–35 mm long
Rachilla jointed between florets which fall separately at maturity; awn slender, mostly less than 40 mm long
Rachilla not jointed between florets which fall united at maturity; awn stout, mostly more than 40 mm long
Lemma apex deeply bifid, tapered to setiform lobes 3–5 mm long; body of lemma densely hairy in lower half
Lemma apex shallowly bifid, lacking setiform lobes; body of lemma usually rather sparsely hairy
Glumes 30–50 mm long; lemma of lower floret 23–30 mm long; awn 60–90 mm long
Glumes 20–30 mm long; lemma of lower floret 14–23 mm long; awn 30–60 mm long
